comment.author: 25725739@N00
comment._content:
Good Day....This photo was PROBABLY taken during the Civil War [1861-1865],,,,,The monument was STARTED in 1848......construction did not resume until 1876.....completed in 1884......
If you look carefully at any of the black and white photos taken after the completion date, you will see an OBVIOUS color difference ......  the bottom "starter" portion and the finished upper portion...obviously two different sources were used to acquire the blocks....Dave
